00004 /* This code implements the MD5 message-digest algorithm.
00005    The algorithm is due to Ron Rivest.  This code was
00006    written by Colin Plumb in 1993, no copyright is claimed.
00007    This code is in the public domain; do with it what you wish.

00029 #ifndef MD5_H
00030 #define MD5_H
00031 
00032 #include "system.h"
00033 
00034 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00035 # include <linux/types.h>
00036 #else
00037 # include <inttypes.h>
00038 #endif
00039 
00041 #define MD5_SIZE 16
00042 
00043 #ifndef __KERNEL__
00044 
00046 typedef struct MD5Context_def
00047 {
00048   uint32_t buf[4];
00049   uint32_t bits[2];
00050   unsigned char in[64];
00051 } MD5Context;
00052 
00053 extern void MD5Init (MD5Context *ctx);
00054 extern void MD5Update (MD5Context *ctx, unsigned char const *buf,
00055                        unsigned int len);
00056 extern void MD5Final (unsigned char digest[MD5_SIZE], MD5Context *ctx);
00057 extern void MD5HexFinal (unsigned char digest[MD5_SIZE * 2], MD5Context *ctx);
00058 extern void MD5Transform (uint32_t buf[4], uint32_t const in[16]);
00059 
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #endif /* !MD5_H */
